Paris is a huge city with lots of places to go and things to admire! Eiffel Tower, standing in the center of the city, is the most worthwhile monument to see. Made in 1889 for the Exposition Universelle for the 100th anniversary of the French Revolution, Eiffel tower is 324 meters tall. Let\'s start!

Standing in front of a huge door? You are definitely standing above the historical Arc de Triomphe, stated in the middle of the Place de l\'Étoile, was made by the architect Jean-François-Thérèse Chalgrin in 1806 and symbolizes the victory of the Austerlitz\'s battle.

Sailing in the Seine, you will meet the Ile de la cité, the island where Notre-Dame is stated. It is about an enormous cathedral temple made in the middle of the 13th century and supposed to be one of the biggest church in the world.
